cons: Dandelion has the potential to affect your medications. For example, dandelion can make medications leave your body more quickly.
description: This herb helps to reduce weight and control cholesterol levels in the blood.
Its leaves are giving health benefiting flavonoids such as carotene-ß, carotene-α, lutein, cryptoxanthin, and zeaxanthin.
It may help the protect from lung and oral cavity cancers.
The herb is an ideal source of minerals like potassium, calcium, manganese, iron, and magnesium.
name: Dandelion
pros: This herb helps to reduce weight and control cholesterol levels in the blood.
Its leaves are giving health benefiting flavonoids such as carotene-ß, carotene-α, lutein, cryptoxanthin, and zeaxanthin.
It may help the protect from lung and oral cavity cancers.
The herb is an ideal source of minerals like potassium, calcium, manganese, iron, and magnesium.
Consuming dandelion tea in moderation is not bad for health for pregnant women.
